answers.author: Katharine Greenlee
answers.text:
Hi Sandy, 
I believe you are looking for ICMA-RC which handles retirement accounts. ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations. You can visit their website at www.icma-rc.org or call 1-800-669-7400. 
Katharine Greenlee
Community Engagement Manager, Knowledge Network 
kgreenlee@icma.org

author: Sandy Streeter
text: When can you take money from your account.  I am age 62 and would like to take 6,000 out of my account but I am still employed full time with the city.
title: Collecting Benefits
